title: Vanilla LoL game mode
body: Can people help me in my rebellion against the tyrant overlords at riot, I feel as though a retro/vanilla league game mode would actually be really successful, and would be a great alternative to the current crappy game modes in the rotation. (Talking about old map, old champs, none of these new champs)

replies.body: Ive been hoping for a vanilla gamemode for a long time, but not as a rotating gamemode, as a permanent gamemode
